TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 290,000 to 307,000 head versus 302,000 week ago and 297,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 120,000 to 125,000 head versus 130,000 week ago and 124,000 a year ago. Reuter
